name: Onboarding Zero-Tolerance — Target Self-Tagged (Sanctions/Freeze/Illicit)
description: Reject onboarding if the target address itself is tagged as Sanctions, Terrorism Financing, Public Freezing Action, Illicit Markets, or Other Financial Crimes.
reference: UAE Federal AML Law & VARA Rulebook Section 3.1 (CDD)

name: Onboarding High-Risk — Target Self-Tagged (Cybercrime/Obfuscation)
description: Trigger EDD if the target address itself is tagged as Cybercrime or Obfuscation (Mixers, Privacy Tokens).
reference: VARA Rulebook Section 3.1 (EDD) & VARA Prohibited Activities

name: Absolute Zero-Tolerance (Sanctions/Terrorism)
description: Trigger Severe Freeze for any exposure to Sanctions, Terrorism, Law Enforcement Freezes, or Illicit Markets.

name: High-Risk Jurisdiction & CEX Strict Ban
description: Immediately freeze assets if interacting directly with High-Risk Jurisdiction CEXs.

name: Strict Obfuscation & Anonymity Ban
description: Reject transactions exposed to Privacy Tokens, Mixers, or anonymizing protocols per VARA explicit prohibitions.

name: Cybercrime Dust-Filtered Threshold
description: Trigger EDD for Cybercrime exposure only if the percentage > 10% AND the amount > 100 USD (dust filter).

name: Outflow Zero-Tolerance Exposure (Sanctions/Terrorism Destination)
description: Trigger Severe Freeze if outflow reaches any node tagged Sanctions, Terrorism Financing, Illicit Markets, or Public Freezing Action with any exposure > 0%.
reference: UAE Federal AML Law & VARA Rulebook Section 4 (STR)

name: Outflow Direct Interaction (Hop 1 Sanctioned Destination)
description: Trigger Severe Freeze for direct (1-hop) outflow to sanctioned or terrorism-linked entities.
reference: UAE Federal AML Law & VARA Rulebook Section 4 (Direct Contact)

name: Outflow High-Risk Destination (Cybercrime/Mixers/Gambling)
description: Trigger EDD if outflow reaches Cybercrime, Obfuscation, Gambling, or High-Risk Entities with exposure > 10% AND amount > 100 USD.

name: VARA Travel Rule & CDD Trigger
description: Trigger Travel Rule and mandatory CDD for transactions > 950 USD (approx AED 3500).

name: Single Transaction KYC Trigger (>950 USD)
description: Trigger full KYC/CDD verification if a single transaction exceeds 950 USD (~AED 3500) per UAE threshold.
reference: UAE Federal AML Threshold (AED 3,500) & VARA CDD Requirements

name: VARA Structuring Alert
description: Trigger review if daily cumulative volume > 950 USD to detect Smurfing effectively.

name: CFT Zero-Tolerance Outflow (Hop Tracing)
description: Trigger Severe Freeze and STR if outflow path interacts with Terrorism Financing, Sanctions, or Illicit Markets to prevent providing material support to bad actors.
reference: UAE EOCN & VARA Compliance Guidelines 2.1 (Outflow capped at 3 hops)
